item.description: Introduction: I’m Joe Behymer. I have been in the technology industry in many different roles since 2006. I have been a technican, a systems administrator, and even spent 4 years teaching high school IT. I have noticed that it is getting more and more difficult to find reliable, local support without spending thousands of dollars just to get someone onsite. I started Behymer Tech to be your first stop on your search for technology support.

item.title: Thankyou
item.description: Thank you for your submission! I will do my best to get back to you as soon as possible!

item.title: Contact Behymer Tech
item.description: Please feel free to reach out to me. If you have an emergency, you are welcome to call or text me on my cell phone at 513-850-4725. Please be aware that this is not my main job and I will not answer if I am currently working. Expect a call back after 4:30pm. If your question or problem is not urgent, please email using the form below. Current rates: $80/hour Onsite work requires a minimum of 2 hours.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Hello and welcome! This is the new homepage of Joe Behymer and Behymer Tech I will be documenting the workflow for updating this site and the technologies used. I hope to expand this blog with more information, technical write-ups, and more geek music!

item.title: Port Song Part 2
item.description: Part 1 of my original Port Songs to help you memorize common ports used in CompTIA Network+, Security+, and other exams!
